summary: Removes on-screen items depending on which file you download.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve been doing some digging around about modding the HUD, and been posting on bethesda forums about my progress. Someone there asked me to make a no-hud mod, so here it is. Also made a variation that doesn\'t hide the key prompts, since it\'s rather difficult to aim at a bunch of items without seeing the names.

I also wrote a [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1800]guide[/url] on the methods I used making this mod since the existing documentation is rather limited.

======================================================================
Variations
======================================================================

NoHUD:
[X] Cursor (can be disabled from options, so I left it in)
[ ] Text (location, bounty, etc.)
[ ] Key prompts (pick up item, open door, talk to people, etc)
[ ] Item info when picking up (\"Iron dagger - weight - value\")
[ ] Compass & shout meter
[ ] Magicka/Health/Stamina bars
[ ] Sneak meter
[ ] Arrow amount
[ ] Enchantment bars

Let me know if I forgot to remove something.
======================================================================

TextHUD:
[X] Cursor (can be disabled from options, so I left it in)
[X] Text (location, bounty, etc.)
[X] Key prompts (pick up item, open door, talk to people, etc)
[X] Item info when picking up (\"Iron dagger - weight - value\")
[ ] Compass & shout meter
[ ] Magicka/Health/Stamina bars
[ ] Sneak meter
[ ] Arrow amount
[ ] Enchantment bars

======================================================================

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2938]HUDmod - Work in progress:[/url]
Modifies item positions on-screen as well as a couple of other things.
Here\'s a screenshot of what it looks so far: [url=http://i.imgur.com/1wnAA.jpg]http://i.imgur.com/1wnAA.jpg[/url]


======================================================================

Installation:
Place hudmenu.gfx in \\Data\\Interface\\Exported

Uninstallation:
Delete \\Data\\Interface\\Exported\\hudmenu.gfx


I\'ve only tested the mods fairly briefly, so there may be bugs. If you find any, let me know.
author: 0rava
